item.description:
This event will be an open game night (Strategy, Word, Card, Dice and/or Party games).

 

 

 

 

I have a variety of games including:

  • Dominion (my favorite game)
  • Kingdom Builder (my newest game)
  • Luck of the Draw
  • Anomia
  • Apples to Apples
  • U-build Monopoly
  • Battle of the Sexes
  • Outburst

Feel free to bring your favorite games.

---

Snacks:

I'll have some beverages available. Please feel free to bring snacks.

---

About the location:

We will be playing in the community room of the Essex building.

Please meet at the front door of The Essex condo (11 Church St, Salem - across from what some folks call "the Almy's parking lot" - you'll see the green awning) and then I will take everyone downstairs to the Essex Room. Those who arrive later will need to call me to get in (978-219-9292). My number/directions will be posted on the front door.

I think the large parking lot is only free after 8pm. If you park in the garage I can sell you a validation sticker that gives you free parking.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Open Game Night in Salem
